sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>notify_participant_session</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>true</execute_function> <filter_condition table="notify_participant_session">active=false^EQ<item endquery="false" field="active" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="false"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Update Participant Active State</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) { var part = current.notify_participant.getRefRecord(); if (!(part && part.isValidRecord())) return; var gr = new GlideRecord("notify_participant_session"); gr.addActiveQuery(); gr.addQuery("notify_participant", current.notify_participant); gr.setLimit(1); gr.query(); var state = gr.hasNext(); if (state && !gs.nil(current.notify_call)) return; var db = new global.NotifyDatabase(); db.setConferenceCallParticipantActiveState(current.notify_participant.getRefRecord(), state); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-06-11 09:13:05</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>01e04342eb200200216a87b9d106fee1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>58</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Participant Active State</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">c600d3a193a00210b31a30dcebba10e1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_01e04342eb200200216a87b9d106fee1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-29 10:24:08</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=01e04342eb200200216a87b9d106fee1"/> </record_update>
